EXE ADSChangeToolStatusView.description:
Changes the status if a Device (only supports Device not genereal Resources).
The property subState is optional.

EXE ADSCreateMfdUnitFutureHoldView.description: Adds a future hold the the given lot at when the lot enters (onEntry=true) or tries to exit (onEntry=false) the given stage and step combination.

EXE ADSPerformMfdUnitScrapView.description:
Scrap components in a Lot. Quantity is mandatory. For unidentified material the View property childUnitsString (comma separated list: e.g. LOT001.01,LOT001.02) is optional.

Example 1 - Identified Material:
com.eyelit.ads.importer.view.ADSPerformMfdUnitScrapView
id=REQ.LOT_ID/P,targetContainer=MfdUnit,code=MON,quantity=2,childUnitsString=REQ.COMPONENTS/P

Example 2 - Un-identified Material:
com.eyelit.ads.importer.view.ADSPerformMfdUnitScrapView
id=REQ.LOT_ID/P,targetContainer=MfdUnit,code=MON,quantity=2
